title: Seeing the world through Aether
post_text: As many of you know I nearly took a oneway trip to the aether, and the price I paid was my eyes. Now, I view a world composed of aether

title: Thine art of Doublecrossing
post_text: Thou must be aquiessed now with the brood that voyages in umbral ways. Art they thine enemy? Mayhap, but even if it was so, one gains little from crossing swords.

title: Why I chose the surname Master Matoya
post_text: Now that the word is out (thanks alphinaud), I feel the need to explain: I was not trying to appropriate her title. If anything, it was more of an homage. Remember, I was in The First for longer than most of you and with no indication that I would ever return.

title: Lessons from the Crystal Braves
post_text: Whilst I would never claim to be perfect, there was a time in which I was convinced I knew better than most Eorzeans. The petty disputes drove me insane, and I unfortuantely believed myself to be a more insightful leader. It's one of the most embarrassing mistakes I made and one that nearly cost me those dearest to me.
